channel.title: Comments on: WordPress 2.7 Released – XML-RPC and AtomPub Changes

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2008/12/11/wordpress-27-released-xml-rpc-and-atompub-changes/#comment-2574">LouwDV</a>.
That's an odd error, make sure that your WordPress install is not missing any files. Also go through the regular debug checks, disable all of your plugins and see if the problem still happens. Switch to the default WordPress theme and see if it still happens. Either of those (plugins and themes) could cause problems, so best to rule them out quickly.
item.content:encoded:
